RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Notes Strum
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Vincent Voois [ http://tinyurl.com/vvrns ]
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Adds keybindings to jump an arbitrary amount of lines in the Pattern Editor. When activated, two new keybinding entries will show up in the Pattern Editor:Navigation:Custom Jump Lines Up/Down. Which can be configured with in the Tools menu.
